summary.para: Inserts a change operation at the end of an array.

param.name: ppropChange
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to the interface that contains the change.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Replaces the first occurrence of a change that affects the same property key as the provided change. If the property key is not already in the array, this method appends the change to the end of the array.

param.name: ppropChange
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to the interface that contains the change

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.

summary.para: Gets the change operation at a specified array index.

param.name: iIndex
param.para: Type: UINT
The index of the change to retrieve.

param.name: riid
param.para: Type: REFIID
A reference to the desired IID.

param.name: ppv
param.para: Type: void**
The address of a pointer to the interface specified by riid, usually .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of change operations in the array.

param.name: pcOperations
param.para: Type: UINT*
A pointer to the number of change operations.

summary.para: Inserts a change operation into an array at the specified position.

param.name: iIndex
param.para: Type: UINT
The index at which the change is inserted.

param.name: ppropChange
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to the interface that contains the change.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Specifies whether a particular property key exists in the change array.

param.name: key
param.para: Type: REFPROPERTYKEY
A reference to the structure of interest.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if key is found; otherwise, E_FAIL.

param.name: iIndex
param.para: Type: UINT
The index of the change to remove.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods for several multiple change operations that may be passed to .

remarks.para: Either call with a class identifier (CLSID) of CLSID_PropertyChangeArray or call to obtain a standard implementation of this interface. This is a container interface that allows multiple changes to be passed to a single file operation to prevent accessing a file multiple times.
